ques: The dense _________ was home to a variety of wildlife.
The ice sculpture began to _________ in the warm sun.
The _________ was teeming with alligators and snakes.
Dinosaurs are believed to be _________ and no longer exist.
The explorer ventured into the dense _________ to study wildlife.
Animals in cold climates have thick _________ to keep warm.
The _________ provided a safe haven for boats during the storm.
The children played in the _________, making mud pies.
The _________ of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
A tiny _________ ignited the dry leaves, starting a wildfire.
Air _________ from factories can have detrimental effects on health.
The _________ in the air signaled the arrival of winter.
A _________ of wildebeests migrated across the savannah.
The loud _________ echoed through the valley during the storm.
The small animal hid in the _________ to avoid predators.
They counted the seconds between the lightning flash and the _________ to estimate the storm's distance.
They hiked through the _________, enjoying the sights and sounds of nature.
They observed a large _________ of elephants in their natural habitat.
The flowers released a sweet and fragrant _________.
She wiped her shoes on the doormat to remove the _________.
They used a hairdryer to _________ the crayon wax onto the canvas.
Their conversation about space exploration was the _________ of her interest in astronomy.
They bundled up in warm clothing to combat the _________.
They trekked through the dense _________, navigating the waterlogged terrain.
The coat was made from the _________ of a rare and endangered species.
They watched as the ships entered the _________ at sunset.
Environmentalists advocate for measures to reduce water _________.
The dodo bird is an example of an _________ species.
The towering trees in the _________ provided shade from the sun.
Bloodhounds have an excellent _________ sense and can track scents for miles.
They set up camp near the edge of the _________.
The city experienced high levels of noise and light _________.
The shepherd led the _________ of sheep to graze in the field.
They touched the soft _________ of the rabbit.
The collision of the two cars created a shower of _________.
The gardener removed weeds and excess _________ from the garden.
Conservation efforts aim to prevent endangered species from going _________.
The dense _________ vegetation made it challenging to see ahead.
The sudden _________ startled the children.
A sudden _________ ran down her spine as she entered the haunted house.
The bustling _________ was filled with fishing vessels and sailboats.
The chocolate chips started to _________ as they were added to the hot dough.
The inventor had a brilliant _________ of inspiration for a new invention.
The rancher managed a _________ of cattle on the ranch.
The forecast predicted heavy rain and _________ for the evening.
The fashion industry faced criticism for using animal _________ in clothing.
Mosquitoes are a common pest in the humid environment of a _________.
Heavy rain turned the pathway into a sea of _________.
The volcanic eruption led to the _________ of many species.
The snow will _________ when the temperature rises above freezing.
The _________ master guided the ship to its berth.
The candles emitted a calming _________ that filled the room.
After the hike, they relaxed by the campfire to ward off the _________.
The _________ provided shelter for various bird species.
The _________ was a tranquil and peaceful place to explore.
Plastic _________ in the oceans poses a threat to marine life.
The lighthouse at the entrance of the _________ helped ships navigate safely.
In some regions, a _________ fire can spread quickly.
The biologist conducted research on the unique ecosystem of the _________.
The _________ of the ocean breeze was invigorating.
Foresters work to protect and conserve our planet's _________s.
She recognized the familiar _________ of her grandmother's perfume.
Government regulations aim to limit industrial _________ emissions.
A _________ in the electrical circuit caused a power outage.
The car's tires kicked up _________ as it sped down the dirt road.
The _________ of the mink is highly prized for its quality.
He watched the ice cream slowly _________ on a hot summer day.
Some scientists study fossils of _________ animals to learn about Earth's history.
A _________ of bison roamed freely in the national park.
The rolling _________ continued for several minutes.
